fields.title: Add pre-upload extension point to allow plugins to interfere upload operations
fields.body:
Add pre-upload extension point to allow plugins to interfere upload
operations right before GitBlit begins to send a pack back to the git
client.

If upload fails the validation, the plugin can throw an exception which
will cause the upload to fail and the exception’s message text will be
reported to the git client.

It can also be used to broadcast some information to the client. One idea
is to implement Message/Hint of the day plugin to expose hints or fortune
game plugin to generate new fortunes on every Git pull request.
